name: Hit Boxing
description:
Game turn begins with player. Player needs to press spacebar few times for punch direction. The more pressing, the stronger and less possible punch will be. When defencing, player needs to select icon of not damaged shield. Decrease enemy hp to minimum for winning.

Settings can help you tune music, effects volume, toggle vibrating, screen shaking, option to press/hold space bar (or right lower button on your gamepad) and difficulty level.

Good luck, have fun!
